name: Little Robot Dude | Alpha build
description:
Little Robot Dude is a metroidvania game where the player you have to get off a unknown planet that you have crashed onto. Remember that this is a alpha build and doesn't represent the full game. Thanks for playing! :D

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrows for moving back and forth.
  • Z for jumping. (holding down allows for a larger jump)
  • X for shooting.
  • ESC for pausing the game.
  • E for interaction.
  • Mouse for interaction with menus
